headline: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chiri muAmerica, VaNdenda, Vobata Pamwe neMasangano Akawanda muKusimudzira Vechidiki neNharaunda kuZimbabwe
text: Muchirongwa chedu chatinotarisa zviri kuitwa nevana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika, svondo rino tine hurukuro naVaInnocent Ndenda vari mudunhu reTexas muAmerica asi vachibva kuHwedza mudunhu reMashonaland East. VaNdenda, avo vakaenda kuAmerica muna 2016, vanoti kunyange hazvo vachishanda samaneja pane imwe kambani kwakare kuTexas, vakaramba vachienderera mberi nemabasa avo avaiita vachiri kumusha, ekubatsira vanoshaya pamwe nekusimudzira nharaunda yavanobva. Pari zvino vanoti vari kushanda nemasangano matatu anoti reMubatirapamwe Trust, iro rinobatsira vanenge vachishandisa zvinodhaka, reMakoni North District Association, rakanangana nenyaya dzebudiriro, pamwe nereGlobal Exchange Program, iro rinobatanidza vanhu vanobva kunyika dzakasiyanasiyana. VaNdenda vanoti shuviro yavo ndeyekuona vana veZimbabwe vachiisa misoro pamwe vosiyana nehumbimbindoga, vachiti chose chinezwi rekuti kubatana chinobudirira. Vanoti ivowo vane shuviro yekuti vange vachizorangarirwawo mune remangwana semunhu akabatsira mukushanda nevamwe kubatanidza vanhu kuti vavandudze magariro avo. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weNamibia, VaHage Geingob, Vanovhura ZITF Vachikurudzira Kudyidzana kweZimbabwe neNamibia
text: Mutungamiri weNamibia, VaHage Geingob, vanoti kudyidzana pakati peNamibia neZimbabwe munyaya dzemabhizimisi kwakaderera vachiti kudyidzana uku kunofanirwa kukwira. Vachivhura ZITF yegore rino zviri pamutemo, VaGeingob vati mugore rapfuura Namibia yakatenga kubva kuZimbabwe zvinhu zvemari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemana emadhora. Vati kudyidzana pakati peNamibia neZimbabwe uye pakati penyika dzemuAfrica kunofanirwa kukwira vachiti kuita izvi kunobatsirawo kusimudzira hupfumi henyika idzi. VaGeingob vati Namibia ichiri yakatarisana nedambudziko munyaya yekugovewa kweivhu vakati nyika yavo inogona kudzidza zvakawanda kubva mukugadziriswa kwakaitwa nyaya iyi muZimbabwe vachiti kugadzirisa nyaya iyi kunobatsira kurwisa hurombo hune veruzhinji. Vati hurmende yavo yakatanga chirongwa chavakati "Harambe" senzira yekurwisa hurombo uye kusimudzira hupenyu hweveruzhinji munyika mavo. VaGeingob vati vemakambani vanofanirwa kuita zvemabhizimisi vasina kungonangana nekuwana mari chete, asi kubatsirawo kurwisa hurombo. Vasati vatura mashoko avo, VaGeingob vamboshanyira nzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana muZITF pamwe nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vachiona zviri kuratidzwa pachirongwa ichi. Nyika gumi neina chete ndidzo dzange dziine makambani adzo achiratidza zvigadzirwa paZITF yegore rino. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inonyorerana Chibvumirano neKambani yeKunze Kuti Ishambadze Marasha
text: Hurumende yanyorerana chibvumirano neimwe kambani yekunze kwenyika kuitira kuti ibatsirwe mukutengesa marasha kunyika dzakaita seIndia neJapan. Vachitaura pakunyoreranwa kwechibvumirano ichi ne Victoria Consulting, gurukota rinoona nezvezvicherwa, VaWinston Chitando, vati donzvo rehurumende nderekuti nyika iwanirwe kwekutengesera marasha kuIndia uye kuitira kuti iwane mari yekushandisa mukuchera marasha aya. VaChitando vati Zimbabwe inofungidzirwa kuti ine marasha anosvika mabhiriyoni makumi maviri nemashanu ematani asi pagore kuri kucherwa matani ari pakati pemamiriyoni maviri nemamiriyoni matatu. VaChitando vatiwo India ndiyo inotenga marasha akawanda pagore zvichienzaniswa nedzimwe nyika. Vachitaura pamusangano mumweyo, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vati Zimbabwe inofanirwa kutora mukana wekudyidzana wakanaka uripo pakati payo neIndia. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kuziva kuti kambani yeVictoria Consulting yakamboshanda nenyika dzipi, uye kuti vakuru vayo ndivanani. Asi vaimbove mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvezvicherwa muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, VaGift Chimanikire, vati havaoni kuti zvakanaka kuti Zimbabwe itsvage misika yekutengesera marasha kunze kwenyika, ipo pari zvino kusiri kucherwa marasha anokwana munyika. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi, VaNyasha Muchichwa, vatiwo havaoni zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe itsvake kambani yekunze inonotsvakira Zimbabwe misika yemarasha. VaMuchichwa vatiwo zviri nani kuti kushandiswe hukama hwagara huripo nedzimwe nyika. Dandemudande rebazi rezvezvicherwa rinoti Zimbabwe ine marasha akanaka, uye ine nzvimbo makumi maviri nepfumbamwe dzine marasha. Makambani maviri chete munyika, Hwange Colliery neMakomo Resources, ndiwo ari kunyanyochera marasha. No media source currently available

headline: VaMasaraure Vanoti Havasi Kuzorega Kurwira Mihoro Yakakwana yeVarairidzi
text: Mutungamiriri wesangano rinomiririra varairidzi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, avo vakapambwa nevanhu vatanhatu pakati pehusiku, vanoti vakarohwa zvakaipisisa, uye vakatorerwa mbatya dzavainge vakapfeka. VaMasaraure vanoti vakakuvadzwa mumusoro, kumusana, maoko nemakumbo, vachiti vamwe vevanhu vakavapamba ndevamwe vechikwata chakambovapamba muna Ndira gore rino, vachiti izvi hazvisi kuzovadzorerwa sure mukurwira kodzero dzevarairiridzi. VaMasaraure vanoti hurumende yave kutora vanorwira kodzero dzevashandi sevavengi vachiti hapana anoda kupidigura hurumende asi kuti vanhu vanoda kuti vakwanise kuriritira mhuri dzavo. VaMasaraure vaudza Studio7 kuti vaudzwa navana chiremba kuti vambozorora kuenda kubasa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, kuti tinzwe pamire hurumende panyaya yekupambwa kwava Masaraure sezvo vanga vasingadaire nharembozha yavo. No media source currently available

headline: Rimwe Sangano reVarimi Rotsigira Hurongwa hweKubhadhara Vachena Vakatorerwa Minda
text: Rimwe sangano revarimi reZimbabwe Farmers Union (ZFU), rinoti rinotambira nemufaro hurongwa hwehurumende hwekuti varimi vatema vari mumapurazi akatorerwa vachena vabhadhare mitero ichashandiswa mukuripa vachena ava budiriro dzavakanga vaita pamapurazi avo. Mukuru weZFU, VaPaul Zakariya vanoti kubhadhara zvivakwa nebudiriro zvakasiya zvaitwa nevachena ava kunopa varimi vechitema ava chiremera chekuti vakabhadhara zvavari kushandisa, kwete kuti vakaita zvekubvuta. “Handiona sekuti chingave chinhu chingaremera vanhu kuti vave ne ownership yakadzika pamusoro peminda yavanenge vachishandisa. Idanho rinokwanisa kuti ritipe chiremera munharaunda yatinogara uyewo nepasi rose kuti vakanga varipo paminda iyoyo vakabhadharwa,” VaZakariya vanodaro. VaZakariya vanoti kubhadhara kwavari kuita mari idzi kuburikidza nemitero iri kubhadhariswa varimi vakagariswa patsva ava hakusi kuti vari kutenga ivhu ravari kurima kwete. “Varimiri vanenge vachibhadhara zvivakwa nebudiriro dzakaitwa nevachena ava, kwete kuti tiri kutenga ivhu redu, kwete.” Mukutanga kwemwedzi uno gurukota rezveupfumi VaPatrick Chinamasa vakazivisa kuti hurumende yakanga yave kutanga kuita ongororo mumapurazi kuti ione kukosha kwakaita budiriro dzakasiiwa nevachena vakatorerwa mapurazi ava. Vakati izvi ndizvo zvinozovapa ruzivo rwekuti murimi oga oga obhadhara marii, uye murimi wechichena akabviswa papurazi apa anozopiwawo marii. Kutanga muna 2000, vachena vanodarika zviuru zvina vanonzi vakabviswa zvine chisimba pamapurazi avo achipiwa kune vatema, asi minda mizhinji yakararira nekuda kwekushaiwa zvikwanisiro kwevarimi vatsva ava. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vashanu Vopora Kubva kuCoronavirus muBulawayo
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muZimbabwe hwasvika pamakumi mashanu nevatanhatu kuti 56. Asi vamwe vanhu vashanu kuBulawayo vapora kubva kuhutachiona uhu zvichireva kuti munyika yose vanhu makumi maviri nevatu vapora. Vanhu vafa vachiri vana. Vanhu vari kurwara makumi maviri nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 29. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzeezvehutano dziri kuyambira kuti kushaikwa kwezvikwanisiro zvekuvheneka vanhu vane chirwere ichi kana kuti matest kits kunoreva kuti vanhu vanoona kunge vari kuparadzira chirwere ichi vasingazive nekuti kue vamwe vanhu vanogona kunge vasingakosore kana kupisa muviri asi vachitapurira chirwere. Gurukuta rinoona nezvehutano Doctor Obadiah Moyo vakatenda kuti nyika yave kupererwa nezvekuvheneka vanhu. Vamwe vakabva kunze kwenyika vachimbochengetwa munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana vanoti vave kunzi vabhadhare mari dzinodarika madhora makumi matanhatu nemashanu ekuAmerica kuti vavhenekwe hutachiona uhu. Asi munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vanyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter kuti hurumende haibhadharose vanhu kunze kwekunga huri hurongwa hwavo vega. Mukuru musangano reCommunity Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike vanoti danho rehurumende rekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba pasina guva yakatarwa harisi kushanda. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zvuru zana kana kuti 100 000 vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muAfrica uye vashaya vadarika zvuru zvitatu nemazana maviri anemakumi mana nevatanhatu kana kuti 3.246. Vapora vanodarika zvuru zvina nezviviri kana kuti 42, 000 Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni mashanu nezvuru mazana matatu kana kuti 5, 3 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuamerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezvuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 1,6 million. Vanhu vafa muAmerica vave kuda kusvika pazvuru zana kana kuti 100 000. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika zvuru mazana matatu 300 000 asi vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni maviri kana kuti 2 million. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Gumi neVashanu (15) Vofa neCovid-19 neMugovera
text: Vanhu gumi nevashanu kana kuti 15 vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika neMugovera vamwe mazana masere nenakumi matatu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 839 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave mazana mana nemakumu masere nevatatu kana kuti 483. Vanhu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kuparira gore rapera vave zvuru makumi maviri nemazana mana ane makumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 20, 499. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vave zviuru gumi bezviviri zvine mazana mana nemakumi matatu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 12, 439 zvichitevera kupora kwevanhu mazana maviri nemamakumi mashanu nevashanu nezuro. Vanhu vachiri kurwara vanosvika zvuru zvinomwe nemazana mashanu ane makumi manomwe nevanomwe kana kuti 7, 577. Kunyangwe muHarare nemuBulawayo muri imo mune vanhu vakawandisa vari kurwara, huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi mumatunhu ose hwawedzera zvave kutyisa kana nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano. Mukuru mubazi rezvirwere zvekutapuriranwa Dr Portia Manangazira vanoti svondo rino hurumende iri kutarisira ongororo inobuditsa pachena kuti kufa nekubatwa kwevanhu nechirwere ichi kuri kukonzerwa nekamwe kamhando katsva kechirwere ichi kakabatwa kuSouth Africa neBritain uye kanzoni kanopararira zvakanyanya kana muvana. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu kana kuti 3 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zviuru makumi manomwe nemaviri zvine zana nemakumi maviri nerimwe kana kuti 72,121. Vapora vadarika mamiriyoni maviri nezvuru mazana mana kana kuti 2,4 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Dunhu reSADC ndirozve rine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 1,3 million. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi masere nemapfumbamwe ane zviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 89, 7 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zvuru mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe nemaviri kana kuti 372, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemaviri kana kuti 22 miillion. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 1, 9 million. Asi vapora pasi rose vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi mana nemapfumbamwe ane zviuru zvisere kana kuti 49, 8 million.

headline: Musangano weInternational AIDS Conference Wotanga muSouth Africa
text: Musangano wemazuva mashanu weInternational Aids Conference wakatanga muDurban South Africane musi weMuvhuro uye uchapera nemusi weChishanu. Musangano uyu uri kuzeya nyaya dzekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheHIV/AIDS uye kuti potsvagwa sei mari yekuita izvi. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa ndivo vavhura musangano uyu zviri pamutemo. VaRamaphosa vakurudzira nyika dzepasi rino nemasangano akazvipira kuti vabatane mukurwisa denda iri. Vamwe vanyarikani vari pamusangani uyu vanosanganisa munyori mukuru weUnited Nation VaBan Ki Moon, vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica, muimbi Elton John uye Nevanzi wamambo kana kuti Prince Harry vekuBritain. Musangano uyu wakarongwa nesangano reInternational Aids Society uye unounza pamwe chete nyanzvi dzinosvika zviuru gumi nenomwe kubva kunyika dzose dzepasi rino. Nyanzvi idzi dzinenge dzichiisa misoro pamwe chete kuti dzibatsirane kurwisa denda iri iro rauraya vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi matatu mumakore makumi matatu nemashanu. Vari kutungamira Zimbabwe kumusangano uyu igurukota rinoona nezvehutano Dr David Parirenyatwa avo vanoti Zimbabwe iri kuda kuvhara maburi ose angaite kuti vanhu vatsva vatapurirwe chirwere cheHIV. Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kumusangano uyu zvinosanganisirawo VaDaniel Molokele vanova mukuru wesangano reAIDS Accountability International avo vanoti Zimbabwe ichabatsirikana nekuve pamusangano uyu. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nasachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Network for Positive Women Amai Martha Tolana vati kunze kwekunzwa zviri kuitwa nevamwe, nyika ichagovawo zvairi kuita. Sangano reUnited Nations rinoti rinoda kupedza mukondombera panosvika gore ra2030 uye panguva imwe cheteyo richiwanirawo vanhu mushonga. Asi UN inoti pachine mutambo sezvo paine vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi matatu vari kurarama nehutachiona pasi rose, vakawanda vari muAfrica. Vanhu vakawanda vanonziwo vari kutapurirwa chirwere ichi zvikuru kuNorth Africa, Middle East nekuRussia. KuRussia kunonzi nyaya iri kupa kuti chirwere chipararire kuramba kutambira nyaya dzechingochani. Asi vakawanda vanoita zvechingochani ava vanonzi vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi zvakanyanya. VaMolokele vanoti Zimbabwe inarowo dambudziko rekusada kupinza ngochani muzvirongwa zvayo. Imwe nyaya iri kupa kuti kurwisa chirwere ichi kunetse inyaya yekuti nyika dzemuAfrica nevanobatsira vave kusunga homwe. Muna Kubvumbi 2001 nyika dzemuAfrica dzakatenderana kuAbuja, Nigeria kuti mumabhajeti adzo dziise mari inosvika zvikamu gumi nezvishanu kubva muzana kunyaya dzezvehutano. Asi zvinonzi nyika imwe chete chete ndiyo yakwanisa kuzadzikisa zvido zveAbuja Declaration. VaMolokela vanoti izvi zvapa kuti kurwisa denda iri kunetse. Amai Martha Tolana vanotendawo kuti kushaya mari kuri kupa kupa kuti zvinhu zvikone n’anga murapwa achida. Kutapuriranwa kwechirwere muZimbabwe kwakadzika kubva pazvikamu gumi kubva muzana kusvika pazvikamu gumi nezvishanu kubva muzana. Asi zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka sezvo Zimbabwe isina mari yakakwana yekubatsira vanorarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS. Zimbabwe iri pachidanho chechishanu panyika dziri pamusoro soro muAfrica pachitariswa nyaya dzekupararira kwemukondombera. Vanhu vanosvika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mana vari kurarama nehutachiona muZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reSACU Rowanisa Nhengo Dzaro muAmerica Ruzivo Pamusoro peCovid-19
text: Sangano rinomirirra zvizvarwa zvekuchamhembe kweAfrica zvinogara munharaunda yeD.C, Maryland neVirginia, reSouthern African Community USA, nemusi weSvondo rakakokera hurukuro padandemutande pamusoro pedenda reCovid-19 senzira yekuti veruzhinji vanzwisise pamusoro pedenda iri uye kuti ringabatwa sei. Nhengo yebhodhi reSACU vachiona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano iri, Muzvare Omega Tawonezvi, vanoti sangano ravo rakatora danho iri kuitira kuti veruzhinji vawane ruzivo rwuzere pamusoro pedenda reCovid-19, iro rashungurudza pasi rose. Muzvare Tawonezvi vanoti kuti vanhu vanzwisise kukosha kwenzira dzekudzvirira nadzo pamwe nekurapa denda iri, vakakoka nyanzvi mbiri dzinoti chiremba vari nyanzvi yemishonga yechirungu Dr. Bukhosi Dube vanove chizvarwa chekuZimbabwe, pamwe nemumwe godobori wemishonga yechivanhu anobva kuSouth Africa kuti vatsanangurire veruzhinji pamwe nekupindura mibvunzo yaive nevanhu. Vamwe vakataurawo pamusangano uyu vanhu vaakapona kubva kudenda iri avo vakagoverawo kune vamwe nzira dzavakashandisa mukurwisana nedenda reCovid-19. Sangano reSouthern African Community USA rinoshandawo nemakanzuru pamwe nehurumende dzematunhu mukubatsira zvizvarwa zvekuAfrica muzvirongwa zvakasiyanasiyana zvinosanganisira zvehutano nezvehupfumi. Muzvare Tawonezi vanoti sangano ravo rine hurongwa hwekuita mimwe misangano nenhaurwa pamusoro pedenda reCovid-19 senzira yekupa ruzivo nedzidziso kunhengo dzavo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Voshushikana neKuwanda kweVanhu Vari Kubatwa neCovid-19 Munyika
text:
Vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kushushikana zvikuru nekukwira kuri kuita huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Vanhu vakawanda vataura neStuduio7 kuChiredzi vanoti huwandu huri kubudiswa hwevanhu vari kubatwa neCovid-19 kwemazuva mana apfuura huri kuvatyisa sezvo guta iri raramba riri roga rine vanhu vakawanda vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi zvichienzaniswa nemamwe maguta mudunhu rose reMasvingo. Dzimwe nzvimbo mudunhu reMasvingo dziri kubuda dzisina kana munhu
mumwe chete anobatwa nechirwere ichi panoongororwa vanhu zuva nezuva. Musi wechipiri 8 Chikumi pavanhu gumi nemumwe vakawanikwa vaine
chirwere ichi mudunhu rose reMasvingo, vapfumbamwe vaiva vekuChiredzi
vaviri vari vemudhorobha reMasvingo. Musi weChitatu 9 Chikumi, pavanhu gumi nevapfumbamwe vakabatwa neCovid-19 mudunhu rose, vese vaiva vekuChiredzi uye nezuro musi wa 10 Chikumi, vanhu vapfumbamwe vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vose ndeve kuChiredzi.

Mumwe mugari wemumusha weTsvovani, VaMalcom Mugodzwa, vanoti vave kutyira hupenyu hwavo.

Mumwewo mugari wemumusha wekwa Zava, VaTiyani Chauke, vanofunga kuti guta ravo riri pedyo nemazambuko ekuenda kunyika dze South Africa neMozambique uko vagari vanobira zvisiri pamutemo nekudaro vanogona
kuuya nechirwere ichi.

Izvi zvatsigirwawo naMuzvare Nyasha Sigauke vachiti ivo hurumende
inofanira kuona kuti vanochengetedza mitemo vapinda mumisha
yemudhorobah iri kuitirakuti vanhu vatevedzere zvisungo zvekuti chirwere
ichi chaisapararire.

Hurumende yati iri kushushikanawo nekukwira kuri kuita chirwere ichi
muChiredzi kunyange hazvo kusati kwave nemunhu arasikirwa nehupenyu.

Mukuru webasa mubazi rezvehutano muMasvingo, Dr Amedus Shamu, vanoti hurumende iri kuita tsvakurudzo yekuti ione kuti chi chiri kukonzera kukwira kwechirwere ichi muChiredzi. Asi mutauriri wekomiti yeCovid-19 Task Force muMasvingo, VaRodgers Irimayi, vati kukwira uku kuri kukonzerwa nevanhu vari kubva kwakasiyana siyana vachinotsvaga mabasa ekukohwa nzimbe muminda yeTongaart Hullert nevamwe varimi. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vana vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika yese, uye vanhu makumi matanhatu nevana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere munyika yose vave zviuru makumi matatu
nezvipfumbamwe nemazana mana ane makumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu, 39 496. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vava chiuru chimwe chete nemazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri nevatanhatu, 1 626. Vanhu mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nevaviri vakaibawa nhomba
yekutanga nezuro izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevabaiwa nhomba yekutanga pamazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe ezviuru nemazana mana nemakumi mashanu nevavviri 690 452. Vanhu zviuru zvina nemazana mapfumbamwe nemamkumi mapfumbamwe nemumwe chete 4 991 vakabaiwa homba yepiri nezuro, izvo zvakasvitsa
vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yepiiri pa zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi mapfumambawe nezvipfumamwe nemakumi mashanu nevana, 399 054. Zimbabwe inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana, 60%,
zvevanhu vari munyika senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere
cheCovid-19. Kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe iine chirongwa ichi, nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti kubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kuchanetsa sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kutadza kubayiwa nhomba yekutanga munzvimbo dzakawanda, sezvo nhomba idzi dziri kushaikwa mumatunhu akawanda munyika. Zvichakadaro, hurumende yeAmerica yazivisa kuti ichabatsira Zimbabwe nemari yekurwisa denda reCovid-19 inotangira pamamiriyoni makumi manomwe nemashanu emadhora kusvika pazana nemakumi
mashanu emamiriyoni emadhora ekuAmerica. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Alliance Yokumbira Musangano neZEC
text: Mubatanidzwa unopikisa weMDC Alliance wanyora tsamba kuZimbabwe Electoral Commission kana kuti ZEC uchikumbira kuita musangano nekomisheni iyi kuti vazeye nyaya dziri kunetsa dzakanangana nesarudzo, idzo dzasarirwa nemazuva makumi maviri nemashanu chete. Mutsamba yanyorwa naVaJameson Timba, avo vari kumiririra vari kukwikwidza musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika vakamirira MDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa kuZEC, mubatanidzwa uyu unoti uri kuda kuona gwaro richashandiswa pakuvhota uye kuti richachengetedzwa kupi. Mumashoko avo, VaTimba vanotiwo vanodawo gwaro revavhoti rine mifananidzo re Biometric Voter Registration. Sachigaro weZEC Amai Priscilla Chigumba vanoti vakagadzirira kuita musangano nemapato ose ari kukwikwidza musarudzo kuti vazeye zvichemo zvavo. VaChamisa vachinyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter vanoti vanyorerarawo kuvatungamiri venyika dzemuSADC neAfrican Union nezvemamiriro akaita zvinhu muZimbabwe. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaMaxwell Saungweme vanoti zvichemo zvine mubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance zvakakosha asi hapachina nguva yekuti zvigadziriswe sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. No media source currently available

headline: VaMushowe Vanokundikana Zvakare Kumira Pamberi peKomiti yeParamende
text: Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaChristopher Mushowe, neChina vatadza zvekare kuuya kukomiti yeparamende kuti vazotaura matanho ari kutorwa nehurumende mukugadzirisa mitemo inombunyikidza vatori venhau pamwe nekusunungura masai sai ematerevhizheni. Nhengo dzeparamende kubva kubato rinopikisa pamwe nemasangano anomirira vatori venhau varatidza kutsamwa kukuru nenamaitiro aVaMushowe avo vakatadza kuuya kudare iri svondo rapera mushure mekunge vakokwa nekomiti yeparamende. Imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, uye vachimirira Mabvuku, VaJames Maridadi veMDC-T, vati kuita kwaVaMushowe kuri kudzorera shure nyaya dzekugadzirisa mitemo inombunyikidza vatapi venhau. Mukuru wesangano rinomiriria nhepfenyuro dzemumatunhu, reZimbabwe Association of Community Radio Stations, Muzvare Vivian Marara, vatiwo zvinoratidza kuti VaMushowe havana chido chekusandura mutemo yekutapwa kwenhau munyika. Muzvare Kholiwe Majama Nyoni veMedia Institute of Southern Africa – Zimbabwe vashorawo kuita kwaVaMushowe. Vatiwo komiti yeparamende iyi haifaniri kurega VaMushowe vachiita madiro aJojina uye inofanira kutora matanho akaoma kuti VaMushowe vauye kudare iri. Vanoona nzvekufambiswa kwebasa musangano Media Alliance of Zimbabwe, VaNigel Nyamutumbu, vati kunyange hazvo vasiri kufara nemaitiro aVaMushowe, vanoonawo sekuti komiti yeparamende iyi haisi kuita basa rayo nemazvo. Pavabvunzwa kuti vachaita sei naVaMushowe, sachigaro wekomiti iyi, VaWilliam Dhewa, vati VaMushowe vabatikana uye vanofanira kupihwa nguva. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaMushowe kuti tinzwe kuti sei vari kutadza kuuya kuparamende. Kunyange hazvo mamwe mapazi ehurumende ari kuunza mabhiri kuparamande kuti mitemo iri pasi pawo isaundurwe kuti ifambirane nebumbiro remitemo yenyika, bazi raVaMushowe harina kana bhiri rarakaunza kudare kubva muna 2013 pakagadzwa bumbiro idzva. VaMushowe vange vachitarisirwa kuti taura kuti mitemo yakaita seAccess to Information and Protection of Privacy Act, Broadcasting Services Act nemimwe ichasandurwa riini. VaMushowe vange vachitarisirwawo kutsanangura kuti sei marezenezi eCapitalk neNyaminyami ayo akapihwa kukambani yeKingstons ave kushandiswa nekambani yeZimpapers. Masangano anomiriria vatori venhau azivisa kuti achaita musangano wechimbi chimbi kuti aronge kuti angaite sei naVaMushowe. Zvichakadai, komiti iyi svondo rinouya ichashanyira nhepfenyuro dzose ichiona kuti dziri kushanda sei. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaMwonzora, Votarisirwa Kuita Musangano kuZimbabwe Grounds neVatsigiri Vavo neSvondo
text: Mutungamiri wechimwe chikwata che MDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vari kutarisirwa neSvondo kuita musangano mukuru munhandare yeZimbabwe Grounds mumusha weHighfields wekutsvagira nhengo dzavo rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo dzema by-election dziri kuitwa mwedzi uno. Mutauriri waVaMwonzora, VaLloyd Damba, vanoti vanotarisira kuti vatsigiri vavo vachabuda nehuwandu hwavo kuenda kumusangano uyu, vachiti havatarisire kuti vangarambidzwa nemapurisa kuunga sezvakamboitika kuEpworth. Panyaya yekuti vanotarisira vanhu vakawanda here misangano yanga ichimboitwa naVaMwonzora yaipindwa nevanhu vashomashoma, vadamba vanoti vanhu havafanirwi kufananidza misangano yaiitirwa mudzimba nemuzvikoro nemusangano mukuru we rally, sezvo zvakatosiyana zvachose. No media source currently available

headline: America Inobudisa Gwaro Rinoshora Kutyorwa kweKodzero dzeVanhu muZimbabwe
text: Bazi re America rionoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, re State Department, rabudisa gwaro pamusoro pekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kwarinoti kuri kuitwa nehurumende yeZimbabwe. Gwaro iri, kana kuti Zimbabwe 2020 Human Rights Report, rine mapeji makumi mana nemapfumbamwe (49), uye rinobva muongororo yakaitwa muna 2020. Bazi re State Department rinoti hurumende mu Zimbabwe inouraya vanhu pamusoro pezvamatongerwo enyika, inotsakatikisa vanhu, kutocha vanhu nekusabata vasungwa zvakanaka. Gwaro iri rinoshoravo majeri emunyika, pamwe chete nekushora mabatirwo anoitwa ngochani mu Zimbabwe. Tatadza kubata vanoona nezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, uye vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yatavatumira. Asi gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, uye vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kwe Africa, VaDewa Mavhinga, vati hurumende ye Zimbabwe haifanirwi kumirira kunzwa zvinobva kunze kwenyika, vachiti kana hurumende ikaterera pose panochema vana ve Zimbabwe, haizotyori kodzero dzavo nekuti inenge yave kuziva zvisingadiwi nevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Nhengo dzeParamende Dzinotora Mhiko Dzichivimbisa Kushandira Zvido zveVanhu
text: Nhengo dzeparamende dzakakunda musarudzo dzegore rino nhasi dzatora mhiko yekutanga basa dzichivimbisa kuti dzichadzika mitemo inosimudzira magariro everuzhinji munyika pamwe nekuvandudza mitemo yese kuitira kuti ienderane nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Nhengo zhinji dzeparamende dzaudza Studio7 kuti dzinofara chose nekusarudzwa kupinda mudare reparamende uye dzavimbisa kuti dzichaita zvese zvadzaivimbisa vanhu. Mumiri weMazowe South muNational Assembly, VaFortune Chasi veZanu PF, vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti mitemo yese ivandudzwe kuitira kuti ienderane nebumbiro remitemo. Mumiri weMt Pleasant, VaSamuel Banda veMDC Alliance, vatiwo nyika inofanira kuva nemitemo inobata vanhu vese zvakaenzana zvisine kuti munhu ndewebato ripi. Mumiri weHarare West vari nhengo yeMDC Alliance, Muzvare Joana Mamombe, vaudza Studio7 kuti shuviro yavo ndeyekuti nhengo dzeparamende kubva kumapato ese, dzishande pamwe mukudzika mitemo nekuita basa rinobatsira mwana wese weZimbabwe. Mumiriri weGokwe-Nembudziya muNational Assembly, VaJustice Mayor Wadyajena veZanu PF, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanoda kushanda vasingatyityidzirwe nemakurukota ehurumende sezvaiitika muparamende yapfuura. Nhengo yeZanu PF, VaJoseph Chinotimba vekuBuhera South, vanoti vachashanda zvakasimbamukusimudzira vanhu vemudunhu ravo uye vatiwo vanoda kuti Studio7 ichitanga kutepfunyura iri muZimbabwe. Mumiri weGutu North, Amai Yeukai SimbanegaviveZanu PF, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vachaedza pese pavanongona napo kuti vanhu vemunzvimbo yavo vawane mabasa. Paramende yagara ichionekwa seisina simba uye ichimanikidzwa kuitwa zvese zvese nemutungamiriri wenyika kana makurukota ake. Asi VaSettlement Chikwinyawa veMDC Alliance vachimirira Mbizo vati izvi hazvisi kuzoitika rwendo rwuno. Munyori weparamende, VaKennedy Chokuda, vagadza nhengo dzese mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe dzedare reNational Assembly nenhengo makumi masere dzeseneti. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson MNangagwa, vanotarisirwa kudomwa nhengo shanu kudare reseneti uye svondo rapfuura vakatodoma vatevedzeri vavo vaviri zvinoreva kuti vasarirwa kudoma nhengo nhatu chete. Matare maviri eparamende aya achagara svondo rinouya kuti asarudze mutauriri weNational Assembly pamwe nemutungamiri wedare reSenate. Pane nzvimbo dzinodarika makumi matatu dzeNational Assembly dziri kupikiswa neMDC Alliance mudare reElectoral Court, zvekuti vari kupikisa ava vakabudirira, vamwe vatoreswa mhiko nhasi vanorasikirwa nenzvimbo dzavo mudare iri, vanenge vanzi vakunda vachitoreswa mhiko yekuti vave nhengo dzedare iri. No media source currently available

headline: HATITYE SRI LANKA: GEMS
text: ari kuLIVERPOOL, England naAbel Ndooka ari muHARARE KAPUTENI wechikwata chenyika chenetball chemaGems — Perpetual Siyachitema — anoti vacharwa semvumba uye vanoda kusimudzira mureza weZimbabwe kumakwishu eVitality Netball World Cup ayo ari kuitirwa kuLiverpool, kuEngland.   Achitaura neKwayedza, Siyachitema anoti maGems achatamba nemwoyo wose kuti vagohwina mitambo yavo vagopedza vari pakati pezvikwata zvikuru zviri kumakwishu aya.   MaGems ari muboka reGroup A umo achasangana nezvikwata zvinoti Australia — iyo inove shasha ine mukombe wenetball — Sri Lanka neNorthen Ireland.   Mutambo wekutanga wechikwata chenyika ichi uriko musi weChishanu chino apo chichasangana neSri Lanka kunhandare yeM&S Bank Arena kuLiverpool Court Two.   Mushure mezvo, maGems achazosangana neAustralia musi weMugovera ozopedzisira neNorthen Ireland musi weSvondo.   Siyachitema anoti kubva zvavakasvika kuEngland, vange vachiongorora mitambo yeSri Lanka iyo yavachasangana navo mumutambo wekutanga ndokuona kuti vatambi vayo varefu zvikuru kusiyana navo sezvo vakati pfupikei.   “Takaongorora chikwata cheSri Lanka, chine vatambi varefu zvikuru kudarika isu asi murairidzi wedu akatsvaga nzira dzekuti tinogona kuvakunda sei.   “Zvekureba kwavo hatisi kuzozvitarisa uye hazvireve kuti vachatikunda, isu ticharwa semvumba mumutambo uyu,” anodaro Siyachitema.   Anoenderera mberi achiti, “Isu senyika pasi rese tiri pechi13 pakutamba netball saka kumakwishu eVitality Netball World Cup tiri kuda kurwa zvakasimba totamba sechikwata kuti tirpedze tiri mutop 8.”   Achitaura pamusoro perutsigiro rwavakawana kubva kumakambani akasiyana anosanganisira Simbisa Brands, Econet, National Foods nemamwe, Siyachitema anoti zvakavasimudzira morari yavo uye zvave kuvatuma kuti vashande nesimba kumakwishu aya.   “Tinotenda zvikuru makambani ese akatibatsira kuti rwendo rwedu rureruke kuenda kumakwishu aya, zvaisava nyore kudai vasipo saka tinotenda zvikuru.   “Rutsigiro rwatawana rwaunza mufaro kwatiri isu vanasikana veZimbabwe uye zvave kutituma kuti titambe nesimba kumakwishu aya,” anodaro Siyachitema.   Pazvikwata zvese zvemuAfrica, maGems ari kumakwishu aya nezvimwe zvikwata zvinoti South Africa, Uganda neMalawi.   Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Netball Association, Leticia Chipandu, anoti vasikana vemaGems vacharwa vamire mumitambo yavo.   Kubva kare, zvikwata zvizhinji zvaikwikwidza kumakwishu epasi rose akasiyana hazvina kumbobvira zvauya nemukombe izvo zvakapedzisira kuitwa nechikwata chemaGolden Girls icho chakahwina menduru yegoridhe kumaOlympics mugore ra1980.   Asi, Chipandu anoti rwendo rwuno zviri kuzoshanduka.   “Chandinovimbisa ndechekuti hatisi kungoburitswa mumutambo uyu uchangotanga, izvo kwete bodo.   “Vasikana vachatamba kusvika kumagumo uye ndinokuvimbisai kuti tichaunza mufaro mukuru kunyika yedu kubva kumakwishu aya,” anodaro Chipandu.

headline: Hatina chekutaura: Zifa
text: MUTAURIRI weZimbabwe Football Association – Xolisani Gwesela – anoti havana chekutaura zvichitevera kumbomiswa basa kwaitwa vatungamiri veZifa neSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) nhasi.   Achibvunzwa neKwayedza kuti Zifa inoti kudii nedanho ratorwa neSRC, Gwesela anoti, “Handikwanise kupindura mubvunzo iwoyo, kana muchida kuziva zvakawanda taurai neSRC mubvunze zvose vanokubatsirai.”   Nhasi mangwanani SRC yazivisa nezvekumisa kwayaita basa bhodhi reZifa nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakawanda izvo iri kupomera sangano renhabvu iro rinotungamirirwa naFelton Kamambo.   Zvimwe zvezvikonzero zvamisirwa Zifa basa zvinosanganisira kusashandisa nemazvo mari yeveruzhinji pamwe nekutadza kupa umboo hwekuti mari iyi yakashandiswei, kutumira zvikwata zvenyika kunokwikwidza kumitambo yakasiyana kunze zvisina kupihwa mvumo sezvinodiwa pasi pemutemo wekurwisa denda reCovid-19 uye mashoko ekushungurudzwa kwevaridzi vepembe vechidzimai.   Nyika yamirira kuona kuti sangano reFifa richatora matanho api kuZimbabwe sezvo isingatendere kuti hurumende dzipindire munyaya dzenhabvu.

headline: Highlanders Yopemberera Kusvitsa Makore Makumi Mapfumbamwe
text: Pamusoro pezvo kuchave nemabiko ekupembera kusvitsa makore makumi mapfumbamwe kwechikwata cheHighlanders uko mukuru wacho, VaNadumiso Gumede, vakavimbisa mumimhanzi pamwe nenhabvu zvepamusoro soro muBarbourfields Stadium neMugovera. Vatsigiri venhabvu vatarisana nemabiko anofadza mukupera kwesvondo. Kubva kumitambo yemuAfrica kusvika kumakwikwi eZimbabwe National Army Charity Challenge, kuchave nemachikichori enhabvu ayo anga achingotaurwa nezvawo svondo rese. Pamusoro pezvo kuchave nemabiko ekupembera kusvitsa makore makumi mapfumbamwe kwechikwata cheHighlanders uko mukuru wacho, VaNadumiso Gumede, vakavimbisa mumimhanzi pamwe nenhabvu zvepamusoro soro muBarbourfields Stadium neMugovera. No media source currently available Asi mutambo uri pamuromo pevazhinji ndeuyo uri kuSouth Africa apo chikwata cheChicken Inn chiri kutarisira kudimbura muswe chikwata chemaBrazilains icho chiri kuparadza zvimwe zvikwata. Mutambi ane mukurmbira muZimbabwe, asi achitambira Memelodi Sundowns, Khama Billiart, achenge ari mumutambo uyu kunyange hazvo asina kupinda mune wekutanga nekukuvara. Chicken Inn yakakuanda 1-0 mumutambo iwoyu asi muteveri wenhabvu, VaLesvison Ndudzi, vanoti ikozvino maGamecocks anofanira kungwarira Billiart Vachitarisa matambiro akaita maGamecocks mumutambo wekutanga, muongorori wezvemitambo ane mukurumbira, VaAndrew Rwodzi, vanoti havasi kunyanyotyira Chicken Inn. Vatsigiri vechikwata cheHighlanders vanogara muSouth Africa vanosvika zviuru zviviri vavimbisa kuti vachange vari munhandare vachikuzirira Chicken Inn. Chimwe chikwata chemuZimbabwe cheHarare City chiri kuMadagascar uko chiri kusangana neAS Adema kwete muCaf Champions League, asi muCaf Confederation Cup. Harare City iri kutingamira 3-2 kubva mumutambo wekutanga zvekuti murairidzi wechikwata ichi, Taurai Mangwiro, anoti haasi kuona vachinetseka kukunda mumutambo wechipiri uyu. Mutambo wekugumisira uchange uri muRufaro Stadium umo Dynamos iri kusangana neZPC Kariba mumutambo wekota fainari yeZimbabwe National Army Charity Challenge. Kunyange hazvo mune manyukunyuku muchikwata ichi, chikwata ichi change chichingotamba mumutambo wehushamwari zvekuti uyu ndiwo mutambo ucharatudza kusimba kwacho. Mutambo uyu wauya mumusha macho musina kumira zvakanaka mushure mekunge murairdzi wacho, Jorge Silva wekuBrazil, nezuro akarova mutori wemifananidzo yepaterevhizheni yeZimbabwe Braodcasting Corporation. Svondo rapera, Silva zvekare akakandirana makobvu nematete nemurairdzi wevabati vepagedhe wechikwata ichi, Gif Muzadzi, izvo zvave kuitisa mibvunzo mumabatiro ebasa rake. Asi vatsigiri venhabvu vari kutarisira kuti chikwata cheChicken Inn pamwe necheHarare City zvichavasiya vachipemberera pachapera mitambo yavo.

headline: FC Platinum Yokurudzirwa Kukunda Mitambo yepaMusha Kuti Ibudirire muMakwikwi eCaf Champions League
text: Chikwata cheFC Platinum chirikuvhura makundano enhabvu egore rino asi paine mibvunzo. Vanotevera mutambo wenhabvu havasi kugutsikana nematambiro arikuita FC Platinum pamusha payo mumitambo yeCaf Champions League vakatarisana nemutambo mukuru neOrlando Pirates yekuSouth Africa iyo yakatora mukombe uyu muna 1995. Nhoroondo yenhabvu muAfrica inotaura kuti zvikwata zvinokunda nemutsindo pamusha ndizvo zvinowanzoenderera mberi nemakundano asi matambiro eKugona Kunenge Kudada muMandava Stadium asimudza mibvunzo mumukana wavo wekusvika kuma kota fainari. FC Platinum yakatatarika zvinotyisa neCnaps yekuMadagascar ndokuzokunda 1-0 mumutambo uyo vaitarisirwa kukanda zvibodzwa pamadiro, ndokuzoita zvekare mangange 0-0 ne Otoyo Oho yekuCongo. Muteveri wenhabvu VaFrancis Mwendamberi vanoti Kugona Kunenge Kudada inofanira kuwedzera mwando pamatambiro ayo pamusha kana ichida kubudirira mumakwikwi aya. Pamusoro peOrlando Pirates, FC Platinum iri mugungano rimwechete ne Esperance yekuTunisia iyo ine mukombe uyu pamwe ne Horoya yeku Guinea. Zvikwata zviviri zvinopedza zviri pamusoro mugungano iri ndizvo zvinoenderera mberi nemakwikwi aya. Muteveri wechikwata cheDynamos VaObert Masvotore vanoti FC Platinum isatarise mazita kana mukurumbira une zvikwata zvavari kusangana nazvo. Mumwe muteveri wemutambo uyu VaTatenda Makazhu ndivo vanofunga kuti Kugona Kunenge Kudada inokwanisa kusvika mufainari yemakundano aya. Asi murairidzi wePirates Milutin Sredojevic audza mapepanhau ekuSouth Africa kuti ari kutya kutamba nechikwata cheFC Platinum nenyaya yekuti chikwata chitsva mumakundano aya uye ati anoremekedza murairidzi wacho Norman Mapeza zvakanyanya. Ati sezvo Pirates iri kutamba neFC Platinum mumutambo wekutanga kuMandava Stadium kuZvishavane, zvinonetsa zvikuru kuenda iko nemugwagwa. Asi Pirates iri kubheja kuti inosimudza mukomb weChampions League kechipiri munhoroondo yayo. Asi FC Platinum ichange isina mutambi akatamba zvinonwisa mvura mwaka uno kana kuti Soccer Star of the Year, Rodwell Chinyengetere, uyo ave kuenda kunotambira Baroka FC ku South Africa naWinston Mhango uyo arikuenda kuSouth Africa zvekare. Kugona Kuenge Kudada irikutarisira kusvika kana kudarika chidanho chakasvikwa neDynamos iyo yakasvika mufainari yeCaf Champions League muna 1998 nemuma semi finari muna 2008. No media source currently available `

headline: ‘Squad yakanaka asi. . .’
text: SHASHA dzakambonetsa dzichitambira maWarriors pamwe nevaongorori vemutambo uyu vanoti chikwata chaSunday ‘Mhofu’ Chidzambwa icho chakasarudzwa kuti chinomirira nyika kumutambo weAfrica Cup of Nations chakanaka kunyangwe zvazvo vamwe vatambi vakaita saWillard Katsande naCosta Nhamoinesu vaifanira kuvewo muchikwata ichi.   Svondo rino, Mhofu akadoma vatambi 34 avo vachapinda mukembi umo vachatanga gadziriro dzekuenda kumakwishu aya. Mutambo uyu uri kutanga nemusi wa11 Chikumi apo Zimbabwe ichatamba neEgypt, kuCairo.   Lazarus Muhoni – uyo akanwisa chibodzwa chakaendesa maWarriors kumakwishu ekutanga eAFCON mugore ra2004 kuTunisia – anoti chikwata ichi chakanakisa zvikuru asi Mhofu angadai akashevedzawo Katsande sezvo ruzivo rwake rwenhabvu rwaizobatsira zvikuru mumutambo uyu.   Katsande ndiye aive kaputeni wemaWarriors kuAFCON yakaitirwa kuGabon uye kugumurwa kwakaita chikwata ichi akabva asendeka shangu dzake achiti anoda kupa vechidiki mukana wekuti vatambewo. Asi pakurwira kuenda kumakwishu egore rino, akamboshevedzwa kamwechete naChidzambwa apo maWarriors akaita mangange 1-1 neDemocratic Republic of Congo.   Muhoni anoti Katsande aigona kushanda basa guru pakumaka Mohamed Salah weEgypt zvekuti aimushaisa mukana wekuita zvidobi-dobi zvake apo zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichasangana.   “Willard Katsande ange achidiwa muchikwata ichi nekuti ndiye ega kubva muZimbabwe akasimba bhonzo uye ane ruzivo rwemutambo uyu sezvo akamboenda kuAFCON kare. Mwedzi yadarika, ange achitamba zvinonwisa mvura kuKaizer Chiefs kwake kuSouth Africa saka anokodzera kuve ari muchikwata ichi. Apa tichitarisa mitambo hedu, haina kuchipa nekuti tiri kusangana neshasha chaidzo dzakaita saMohamed Salah. Katsande ndipo paaigona kushanda basa guru kumunyararidza nekuti Katsande haakusiye uchienda,” anodaro.   Anoti vamwe vatambi vari muchikwata ichi vakaita saThabani Kamusoko naDanny Phiri – avo vakasarudzwa kuti vatambe pachinzvimbo chaKatsande – vanogona kubata basa sebasa.   “Asi tichitarisa hedu vamwe vatambi varimo vanofadza zvavo vakaita saThabani Kamusoko uyo ari kutambira kuDRC kana Danny Phiri. Kamusoko ini ndinomufarira, kuDRC ange achitamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura uye muviri wake mukuru ndewenhabvu chaiwo. Zvikwata zvatinenge tichisangana nazvo zvine vatambi vakuru saka tinofanirwawo kuita vedu vakakura kuti zvitibatsire pakuhwina mabhora,” anodaro Muhoni.   Shasha yekuongorora nhabvu Charles “CNN” Mabika anorumbidza chikwata ichi achiti chakagona kubatanidzwa sezvo chiine vechidiki pamwe nevamwe vave nenguva ndefu vachitamba.   Asi, anoti Mhofu angadai akashevedza Nhamoinesu anove mumwe wevatambi vemaWarriors vakuru vane ruzivo rwakanyanya rwenhabvu sezvo ave nemakore akawanda achitambira kuEurope.   Masvondo adarika, Nhamoinesu akabuda pachena kuti asendeka kutambira maWarriors, asi Mabika anoti Mhofu aifanirwa kugara pasi naye omuudza kuti anoda kumutambisa nekuda kweruzivo rwake rwaanarwo rwenhabvu.   “Chikwata chakabatana nekuti chine vechidiki nevakuru, zvinove zvatinoda asi Costa Nhamoinesu ange achidiwa. Nhamoinesu anodirwa ruzivo rwake uye rwaishanda apa nekuti mitambo yedu haina kuchipa. Ndiye wandinoona aigona kudzikamisa vechidiki munhandare kana chabvondoka,” anodaro Mabika.   Aimbove mubati wepagedhi wemaWarriors neDynamos, Japhet ‘ShortCat’ Mparutsa anoti nguva ino ndiyo yekuvaka chikwata chemaWarriors chichazonetsa makore mashanu kana gumi anotevera.   “Tinofanirwa kutarira kumberi kune remangwana redu, tovaka chikwata icho chichatibatira basa kwemakore mashanu kusvika gumi anotevera.   “Dai ndirini ndiri panyanga, ndaitumira vechidiki vane makore ari pasi pe20 ne23 okuberekwa, tovasanganisa nevashanu kana vatanhatu vagara vachitamba muchikwata ichi kuti vabatsire vechidiki avo vanenge vasarudzwa,” anodaro ShortCat.
